statements: DELETE FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData WHERE machine_id = 1 AND downtime_end < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData WHERE downtime_reason = 'Mechanical Failure' AND id IN (2, 5, 7);
DELETE FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData WHERE machine_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND downtime_start < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ProductionBottlenecks WHERE bottleneck_type = 'Mechanical' AND bottleneck_description LIKE '%broken%' AND bottleneck_analysis IS NULL;
DELETE FROM ProductionBottlenecks WHERE bottleneck_name = 'Machine Failure';
